availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Q. Offutt (Union Co, Ky, merchant)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, merchant. Georgetown, Scott County, Kentucky native. Married to Mary E. Parker Offut. Father of Sallie B. Offut, George P. Offut, Mordecai Offut, and Henry Quincy Offutt. Merchant in Morganfield, Union County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Morganfield, p. 528.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Morganfield, p. 334B.
